changeSet.author: julia de lozanne
changeSet.sql: UPDATE audit_record SET audit_event = JSON_SET(audit_event, '$.documentId', document_id) WHERE classname in ( 'com.ritense.valtimo.contract.document.event.documentRelatedFileAddedEvent', 'com.ritense.valtimo.contract.document.event.documentRelatedFileSubmittedEvent', 'com.ritense.valtimo.contract.document.event.documentRelatedFileRemovedEvent', 'com.ritense.document.domain.impl.event.jsonSchemaDocumentCreatedEvent', 'com.ritense.document.domain.impl.event.jsonSchemaDocumentModifiedEvent' ) AND JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.documentId') IS NULL

changeSet.author: Ivo Zaal
changeSet.sql: UPDATE audit_record SET audit_event = JSON_SET(audit_event, '$.documentId', LOWER(CONCAT( SUBSTR(HEX(document_id), 1, 8), '-', SUBSTR(HEX(document_id), 9, 4), '-', SUBSTR(HEX(document_id), 13, 4), '-', SUBSTR(HEX(document_id), 17, 4), '-', SUBSTR(HEX(document_id), 21) )) ) WHERE classname in ( 'com.ritense.valtimo.contract.document.event.documentRelatedFileAddedEvent', 'com.ritense.valtimo.contract.document.event.documentRelatedFileSubmittedEvent', 'com.ritense.valtimo.contract.document.event.documentRelatedFileRemovedEvent', 'com.ritense.document.domain.impl.event.jsonSchemaDocumentCreatedEvent', 'com.ritense.document.domain.impl.event.jsonSchemaDocumentModifiedEvent' ) AND ( JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.documentId')) like 'base64%' OR JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.documentId') IS NULL )
